procedural_fairness: Immigration officers must act fairly and reasonably when applying guidelines.
humanitarian_and_compassionate_factors: Applicant sought permanent residency under humanitarian grounds.
decision_outcome: Application dismissed; no grounds for certiorari order.
legal_basis: Under s. 114(2) of the Immigration Act, the Governor-in-Council may exempt individuals from visa requirements for public policy or humanitarian reasons.
standard_of_review: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision; analysis of statutory and administrative frameworks.
